name: h3
description: Discover the 2025 Demarini Drop 12 Fastpitch Softball Bat, a game-changer for players seeking a balanced swing and superior performance. Certified by USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC, this bat features a two-piece composite design with a 2 1/4 inch barrel diameter. The vibrant white, purple, and green colorway complements the innovative Paradox Composite Barrel, engineered for a softer, hotter, and more responsive feel. Experience reduced hand vibration with the D-Lite Composite Handle and the Big D End Cap, ensuring every swing is smooth and powerful. Elevate your game with the Spryte series, designed for players who demand excellence on the field. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
